const palette = {

  primarylight: '#faf9f5',
  primarydark: '#04111a',
  confirm: '#0ACA37',
  text: '#757575',
  mute: '#A3A3A3',
  heading: '#404040',
  white: '#ffffff',
  footerBg: '#FBFBFB',
  border: '#EAEAEA',
  line: '#707070',
  tagColor: '#465ef68c',
  error: '#FA5555',
  Blue: '#344ef3a6',
  BlueBorder: '#5265DC',
  Green: '#0aca37',
  GreenLight: '#0aca37a6',
  GreenBorder: '#1AC241'
};

    tagcolor: palette.tagColor,
    blue: palette.Blue,
    blueborder: palette.BlueBorder,

      default: palette.Green,
      light: palette.GreenLight,
      border: palette.GreenBorder
    }
  },
  spacing: {

    s: '8px',
    sm: '14px',

    xl: '32px',

  },

  shadow: {

    l: '0 0 32px rgba(0 ,0 ,0 , 0.06)',
